ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: no good friend will ask about his friend
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And no friend inquires after friend
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and no bosom friend will enquire about any of his bosom friends
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: even intimate friends will not inquire about their friends,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And no friend will ask concerning his friend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And no friend will ask a friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And friend shall not ask of friend
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: no loyal friend shall question loyal friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And no familiar friend will ask a question of his friend
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and no friend will ask about his friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And not a friend shall ask a friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and no friend will inquire about [the welfare of his] friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And no friend will ask after a friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And no friend will ask of a friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: No loyal friend will ask another loyal friend
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: No friend will care about his friend.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And no friend will ask [anything of] a friend,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [70:10] And no friend will inquire about his friend, [no] relative [will inquire] about his relative, each being preoccupied with his own predicament.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And no familiar friend will ask a question of his friend) no relative will ask about his relative
